text: Nukuvuga kwabo yuko twebwe twagandaguye umuhanaguzi Issa mwene Mariyamu (iii) intumwa y’Imana, mugihe batigeze bamugandagura canke batigeze bamubamba ahubwo bamwi kekeranye n’uwundi, mu vy’ukuri bamwe batumvikanye yuko bishe intumwa y’Imana Issa (iii) bari mumwikeko kuri ivyo, kandi ntavyemezo babifitiyeko, ahubwo bakurikira amakenga gusa, mu vy’ukuri ntiba mugandaguye
